NotFoundPage.h3: We can't seem to find the page you were looking for.

NoConnectionPage.h3: It looks like you might be experiencing some network connection issues, please click the back button and try again.

section0.question: What is ELSA?
section0.answer: ELSA is an electronic signature application that enables any document to be electronically signed easily, quickly, and securely

section1.question: How do I sign a Document?
section1.answer: You can sign the document by clicking the sign button next to the document preview.

section1.question: How does the crytographic Signature work?

section2.question: How do I upload a Document?
Which kind of Document types will be supported?
Who has access to my Documents?
How do I add People to sign my Document?
What are the differences of 'Simple Signature' and 'Advanced Signature'?
Can I change the signing type afterward?
section2.answer: Yes, the signature type can be changed afterward. However, then all signatures are already given expire and must be requested again. But don't worry, ELSA will take care of this and inform your contractual partners.

section2.question: Where do I find Information about my Document?
Where can I see the Document History?

section3.question: How do I search for Documents
What are the filter above the Documents?
What does the grey scope next to Documents mean?

section4.question: Where do I find my Account Information?
section4.answer: By a click on the avatar at the top right, a menu opens, click on "My Account." Then, aÂ page opens on which you can view all of your Konoto information and change some of it.

section4.question: How can I set up my Notifications?
Where do I change the language?
section4.answer: Clicking on the flag in the top right opens a menu for changing the language. At the moment, ELSA can be operated in German and English.

section4.question: How do I change my Password?
Is there an Opportunity to change my Email-Address?
section4.answer: It is not possible to change your email address afterward. If you would like to use ELSA under a different e-mail address, you must register again with this address. Your data cannot be transferred to the new account.

section4.question: What does it mean: 'Your Account is not activated by the Admin'?
section4.answer: In order to be able to protect company-internal documents, it is necessary for an admin to manually activate company-external e-mail addresses. This ensures the security of confidential information.

MessagePage.heading: Messages
MessagePage.nonSelected: Select a message to show its content.

upload.exp: Upload an image of your own signature. It will be added to the process protocol.

popUp.heading: Upload signature
popUp.sure: Your progress will be lost if you cancel.
popUp.attentionOne: Warning! You have already uploaded your signature.
popUp.attentionTwo: If you continue it will be lost!

toDo.exp: Get website alerts for new signature/proofread requests.

sign.exp: Get website alerts as a reminder to sign documents/envelopes.

read.exp: Get website alerts as a reminder to proofread documents/envelopes.

progress.exp: Get website alerts that show the progress of your own documents/envelopes.

newVersion.exp: Get website alerts about updated documents.

protocol.exp: Get website alerts about the availability of document protocols.

DocumentSettings.editAll: Edit all documents in the envelope

UploadDoc.chooseFile: Choose a file or drop it here...

error.noDocument: Please choose a document to upload.
error.noEnvelope: Please choose a envelope to upload your document into.
error.noNewName: Please choose a name for the new envelope.
error.noReaders: Please add readers to review the document.
error.noSignatories: Please add signatories to sign the document.
error.noSignatureType: Please choose a signature type for each signatory.

DownloadDoc.heading: Download now!
DownloadDoc.sure: Are you sure you want to download the document?

DownloadProtocol.sure: Are you sure you want to download the protocol?
DownloadProtocol.errorOne: There have been problems fetching the protocol.
DownloadProtocol.errorTwo: Try refreshing the page or contact an admin.

DocumentPage.noView: No preview available. Download the document instead.

errors.notFound: The document you were looking for cannot be found.
errors.refresh: Please try refreshing the page or contact the owner of the document.

Login.reset: To reset your password, you will receive an e-mail containing a reset link.

KeypairAlert.title: Set up your keypair
KeypairAlert.choose: Do you want to upload your own keypair or generate one?
KeypairAlert.warningText: Warning! You have already set up your keypair. If you continue it will be lost!
KeypairAlert.cancelWarningOne: If you cancel now you cannot make advanced signatures until you set-up
KeypairAlert.cancelWarningTwo: your keypair via the settings page.
KeypairAlert.privateKey: Copy your private key and save it to a .txt file.
KeypairAlert.uploadHereExp: Accepted are files that end on .txt. The key has to have 1024 characters
KeypairAlert.success: You have successfully uploaded your public key!
KeypairAlert.successWarning: Do not loose the corresponding private key!

TwoFakAuth.serverErrorOne: There appear to be problems with your server connection.
TwoFakAuth.serverErrorTwo: Please try reloading the page or talk to an administrator.
TwoFakAuth.serverErrorTwoAdmin: Please try reloading the page or contact TechSupport.
TwoFakAuth.fail: There appear to be server problems. Error Code:

login.title: Set up your two-factor authentication
login.firstStep: Step 1: Scan the qr-code with your authenticator app
login.secondStep: Step 2: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
login.always: Enable two-factor authentication for every login
login.alwaysExp: After a successful login you have to confirm your identity by using your second factor.
login.cancelWarningOne: If you cancel now you cannot make advanced signatures until you set-up
login.cancelWarningTwo: your two-factor authentication via the settings page.
login.didIt: You successfully set up your second factor!
login.canUse: You can now use the whole application
login.failedSetUp: Setting up your second factor was unsuccessful.
login.tryAgain: Try again or start from the beginning.
login.attention: Warning! You have already set up your two-factor authentication. If you continue it will be lost!

sign.sureOne: Are you sure you want to sign the following document?
sign.sureMulti: Are you sure you want to sign the following documents?
sign.code: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
sign.sure: Are you sure you want to cancel the process?
sign.leftTries: The code was wrong. Tries until logout:
sign.logout: You put in too many wrong codes. You will be logged out automatically.
sign.accepted: Accepted are files that end on .txt.
sign.uploadExp: Upload your private key to confirm your identity.
sign.notDone: In order to sign you still have to set up the following.

read.sureOne: Are you sure you want to proofread the following document?
read.sureMulti: Are you sure you want to proofread the following documents?
read.sure: Are you sure you want to cancel the process?

welcome.toDo: I'm Elsa. I'm going to help you use this page in the best way possible. Let's start be setting up some important elements for giving signatures.
welcome.2FakAuthExp: A second factor used to confirm your identity will prevent people from using your computer in order to sign under your name.
welcome.keypairExp: Another key element to keep your identity and signature save, because you are they only one that knows your private key.
welcome.fun: You have successfully set up everything you need in order to use ELSA to its fullest.
welcome.cancelWarningOne: If you cancel now you cannot use ELSA completely
welcome.cancelWarningTwo: without setting up every necessary element via the settings page.

corporate.title: Corporate design
corporate.logoUploadHereExp: Accepted are image files. To get a good result use an image with dimensions 400x120 pixel.
corporate.logoSuccess: You have successfully uploaded your logo!
